control_attributes.Control: SA-9 (3) ESTABLISH / MAINTAIN TRUST RELATIONSHIP WITH PROVIDERS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization establishes, documents, and maintains trust relationships with external service providers based on [Assignment: organization-defined security requirements, properties, factors, or conditions defining acceptable trust relationships].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to enable integrity verification of hardware components.

Control Statement: The organization establishes, documents, and maintains trust relationships with external service providers based on [Assignment: organization-defined security requirements, properties, factors, or conditions defining acceptable trust relationships].
Control Name: SA-9 (3) ESTABLISH / MAINTAIN TRUST RELATIONSHIP WITH PROVIDERS
